Nerangs.ab: pad ńiuuaēδaiiemi bun bē nigerišn u-š abastāg bē rāyēnišn
"He has to make an inspection at the beginning of the ńiuuaēδaiiemi and to arrange the abastāg."

ab.ab: NērangVVrS0.14 (Nērang ī āb) [mss. 4000 4010 4020 4025 4063], cf. WiD and Revāyat of Kāma Bohra (MU1, p. 577):
(Pahl.) pad ńiuuaēδaiiemi (Pahl.) bun bē nigerišn pas abastāg bē rāyēnišn
At the beginning of ńiuuaēδaiiemi (they) should be looked. Then the Avesta should be recited.
Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. a) (MU1, pp. 581):
(Pāz.) u pa niuuaēδaiiaemi (Pāz.) nīrəṇg u haṇkāraiiemi (Pāz.) āv nigrīδan
At niuuaēδaiiaemi the nīrang must be looked and at haṇkāraiiemi the water.
Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. b) (MU1, p.584):
pas niuuaēδaiiaēimi gomiz va haṇkāraiiaēimi āb benagarəšn pas hamā saǧešn zur va barsam va urvarām va hum va ǧuvām va ān ātašgāh ism va buy hamā ḫub benagarešn va avestā beḫᵛānešn

Then at niuuaēδaiiaēimi (they) should look at the urine and (at) haṇkāraiiaēimi the water. Then all the utensils should be washed and the barsom. the urvarām, the hōm, the ǰivām and this ātaš-gāh. (They) should look well at all the ēsm and bōy and recite the Avesta.

Ritual.ab: At the beginning of the ńiuuaēδaiiemi, they have togaze (at them). Than, they continue with the abastāg.
